_comment: Created by ianb on 16/12/2014 11:17:33 using v2.3
title: How has the proportion of obese 10-11 year old children changed over time?
analysis_commentary: One in three children in year 6 were overweight or obese in 2012/13. The proportion of year 6 children who are obese has increased by approx. 1.5% during this time period. The proportion who are overweight or underweight has remained stable over this time period. The National Childhood Measurement Programme started in 2005.
